Detailed Description

Tukey Cost Function.

If e^(1/2) < d rho(e) = delta2(1-(1-e/delta2)^3)

else

rho(e) = delta2

void g2o::RobustKernelTukey::robustify ( double  squaredError,
Eigen::Vector3d &  rho 
) const
virtual

compute the scaling factor for a error: The error is e^T Omega e The output rho is rho[0]: The actual scaled error value rho[1]: First derivative of the scaling function rho[2]: Second derivative of the scaling function

Implements g2o::RobustKernel.

Definition at line 100 of file robust_kernel_impl.cpp.

101 {
102  if (e <= _deltaSqr) { // inlier
103  double factor = e*_invDeltaSqr;
104  double d = 1-factor;
105  double dd = d*d;
106  rho[0] = _deltaSqr*(1-dd*d);
107  rho[1] = 3*dd;
108  rho[2] = -6*_invDeltaSqr*d;
109  } else { // outlier
110  rho[0] = _deltaSqr; // rho(e) = delta^2
111  rho[1] = 0.;
112  rho[2] = 0.;
113  }
114 }
